org.svvrl.goal.cmd
Class CommandRepository

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.cmd.CommandRepository

public class CommandRepository
extends java.lang.Object

CommandRepository provides methods for accessing the command pool.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

getCommand

public static CommandExpression getCommand(java.lang.String name,
                                           java.util.List<Expression> args)
                                    throws EvaluationException
Returns the command expression with a specified command name and command arguments.

Parameters:
name - the name of the command
args - the arguments of the command
Returns:
the command expression constructed from the command name name and the command arguments args
Throws:
EvaluationException - if there is no command with name name, there is a problem in instantiating the command, or the arguments args are not accepted by the command

addComplementConstructionInterface

public static void addComplementConstructionInterface(ComplementConstructionInterface intf,
                                                      AutomatonType type)
Inserts a complementation construction interface to this repository and sets the provided construction the default complementation construction for a specified automaton type.

Parameters:
intf - the complementation construction interface to be inserted
type - an automaton type

getGameSolver

public static GameSolverInterface getGameSolver(java.lang.String name)
Returns the command-line interface of a game solver by its name.

Parameters:
name - the name of the returned solver
Returns:
the command-line interface of the game solver of the specified name, or null if there is no solver of such name

Returns the command names in the repository that are closest to a specified incorrect command name.

Parameters:
name - a command name that is supposed to be incorrect
Returns:
the command names that are closest to the incorrect command name
